| rewardname1  = Find Torclef and ensure he returns safely
| reward1      =

'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuests/) in {{poe2}}.

## Synopsis

 
The [Dawnstars](/childrenOfTheDawnstars/) are recent arrivals to [Port Maje](/portMaje/), seeking opportunity in new lands, and their unflagging defense of the [Huana](/huana/) has made them somewhat unpopular with the colonists.

While interactions with the local townsfolk have generally been peaceful, one of the Dawnstars has recently gone missing.
<!--

## Walkthrough

-->

## Behind the scenes

* This quest is incomplete, and while journal entries for it exist, it seems that there is no way to start it

## Journal

{| class="wikitable"
! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | <small>quests\09_port_maje\09_tsk_dawnstar</small>
|-
! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}}
! colspan="2" | Objectives
|-
| rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0'''
| colspan="2" | '''Wandering Stars'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000
| The Dawnstars are recent arrivals to Port Maje, seeking opportunity in new lands, and their unflagging defense of the Huana has made them somewhat unpopular with the colonists.

While interactions with the local townsfolk have generally been peaceful, one of the Dawnstars has recently gone missing.
|-
| colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''Alternate descriptions'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 40001
| While exploring Port Maje, I stumbled upon a conflict between some locals and a dishevelled Readceran. This may be worth looking into.
|-
| rowspan="5" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1'''
| colspan="2" | '''Track down Torclef.'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001
| Maren is worried that one of the Dawnstars, Torclef, has gotten into trouble with the local colonists. She's asked me to keep an eye out for him.
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000
| Maren mentioned that the tavern might be a good place to start asking questions, though Torclef himself abstains from drink.
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001
| The tavernkeeper at the Kraken's Eye hasn't seen Torclef around, but he did mention hearing about some 'excitement' going on at the west end of town.
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004
| Maren mentioned that Torclef was seen heading further into town.
|-
| rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2'''
| colspan="2" | '''Confront Torclef's assailants.'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002
| Torclef seems to have gotten himself in trouble with a few of the locals. Getting him out of this in one piece will be tricky.
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002
| According to the locals, the Dawnstars have been stepping in to help the Huana negotiate better terms. This hasn't made them popular with the Vailians.
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003
| Torclef has been killed.
|-
| rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3'''
| colspan="2" | '''Return to Maren'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003
| Torclef is on his way back to the Dawnstars. Maren should be relieved to see him alive and well. Naked, but well.
|-
| rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''4'''
| colspan="2" | '''Confront the assailants.'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10004
| By the look of things, a priest has run afoul of some of the locals. What this is about, I'm not sure, but it looks like things are getting ugly.
|-
| rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''5'''
| colspan="2" | '''Head back to the Dawnstar camp.'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10005
| Torclef suggested I seek him and the other Dawnstars out in the harbor district. He said that Maren might have a reward for me once I arrived.
|-
| rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''6'''
| colspan="2" | '''Return to Maren with the news.'''
|-
| style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10006
| Torclef has been killed. Maren won't be happy.

|-
! colspan="3" | End states
|-
| style="text-align:center" | {{cross}}
| style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000
| An NPC critical to the completion of this quest has been killed
|-
| style="text-align:center" | {{check}}
| style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001
| I found both Maren and Torclef safely back at the Dawnstar camp. Maren was relieved to see her friend back, and rewarded me for my trouble.
|-
| style="text-align:center" | {{check}}
| style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002
| I gave Maren the grave news about Torclef. She was distraught at the news, and seemed less confident of the Dawnstars' purpose in Port Maje.
|-
| style="text-align:center" | {{check}}
| style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30003
| With the priest dead, this matter has come to a close.
|}

While interactions with the local townsfolk have generally been peaceful, one of the Dawnstars has recently gone missing.
